name: OyeCode - How to use Angular.Js with Visualforce
tagline: This repository contains code for demo application that uses Angular.Js with VisualForce
body:
### Welcome to AngularJS with Salesforce 
Clone this repository in your machine and add the code to your organization to see working model of Angular.Js with Salesforce
```
$ cd mailtoharhit/Angular
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
This is page is designed by [Harshit Pandey](www.linkedin.com/in/pandeyharshit). I blog under domain [OyeCode](http://www.oyecode.com), this repository is maintained by Co-Author [Mohit Srivastav](https://plus.google.com/105746549123575968620/posts) who blog under domain of [CloudyWorlds](http://cloudyworlds.blogspot.com/)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
